org.linqs.psl.reasoner.function

Class FunctionSum

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linqs.psl.reasoner.function.FunctionSum
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<FunctionSummand>, FunctionTerm
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NegativeLogFunction

    public class FunctionSum
extends Object
implements Iterable<FunctionSummand>, FunctionTerm
    A numeric function defined as a sum of FunctionSummands.
